name: GetTrelloCardById
description:
Retrieve details of a Trello card using its ID.

Use this tool to get comprehensive information about a specific Trello card by providing its unique ID. Ideal for accessing card details directly.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello card to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Card

parameters.name: card_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of fields to retrieve for the card. Defaults to all main fields such as badges, desc, due, etc.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/). **Defaults**: `badges, checkItemStates, closed, dateLastActivity, desc, descData, due, start, idBoard, idChecklists, idLabels, idList, idMembers, idShort, idAttachmentCover, manualCoverAttachment, labels, name, pos, shortUrl, url`

parameters.name: include_actions_details
parameters.description: Specify if actions details should be included. Refer to [Actions Nested Resource](https://cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#actions-nested-resource) for more information.

value_schema.description: See the [Actions Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#actions-nested-resource)

parameters.name: include_attachments
parameters.description: Specify if attachments should be returned. Use 'true' for all attachments, 'false' for none, or 'cover' for cover attachments only.

value_schema.description: `true`, `false`, or `cover`

parameters.name: attachment_fields_list
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of attachment fields to retrieve for the card.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of attachment [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: member_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of member fields like avatarHash, fullName, initials, username.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of member [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/). **Defaults**: `avatarHash, fullName, initials, username`

parameters.name: member_voted_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of fields for members who voted on the card. Defaults to `avatarHash, fullName, initials, username`.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of member [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/). **Defaults**: `avatarHash, fullName, initials, username`

parameters.name: include_checklists
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return checklists on the card. Use 'all' or 'none'.

value_schema.description: Whether to return the checklists on the card. `all` or `none`

parameters.name: checklist_fields_detail
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of fields (`idBoard`, `idCard`, `name`, `pos`) to include for checklists.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of `idBoard,idCard,name,pos`

parameters.name: board_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or select specific board fields to include. Defaults to 'name, desc, descData, closed, idOrganization, pinned, url, prefs'.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of board [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/#board-object). **Defaults**: `name, desc, descData, closed, idOrganization, pinned, url, prefs`

parameters.name: sticker_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of sticker fields to retrieve for a Trello card. This determines which sticker-related data is included in the response.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of sticker [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_members
parameters.description: Whether to return member objects for members on the card. Set to true to include them.

value_schema.description: Whether to return member objects for members on the card

parameters.name: include_members_voted
parameters.description: Set to true to return member objects for members who voted on the card.

value_schema.description: Whether to return member objects for members who voted on the card

parameters.name: include_check_item_states
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include check item states of the card; `false` to exclude them.

parameters.name: return_board_object
parameters.description: Set to true to return the board object the card is on. Use false to exclude it.

value_schema.description: Whether to return the board object the card is on

parameters.name: include_list_resource
parameters.description: A boolean to include list resource information related to the card. Set to true to include this information.

value_schema.description: See the [Lists Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/)

parameters.name: include_plugin_data
parameters.description: Specify whether to include plugin data in the card details response.

value_schema.description: Whether to include pluginData on the card with the response

parameters.name: include_stickers
parameters.description: Set to true to include sticker models in the response; false to exclude.

value_schema.description: Whether to include sticker models with the response

parameters.name: include_custom_field_items
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include custom field items in the response; `false` to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the customFieldItems

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.
